LanguageData.HC_WoollyMammoth.label: Woolly Mammoth
LanguageData.HC_WoollyMammoth.description: A prized livestock of the Giants. This amazing creature regularly produce milk and thick fur, which provides protection from the cold weathers. Butching a woolly mammoth will also give a tusk.
LanguageData.HC_WoollyMammoth.tools.0.label: Tusk
LanguageData.HC_WoollyMammoth.tools.1.label: Left leg
LanguageData.HC_WoollyMammoth.tools.2.label: Right leg
LanguageData.HC_WoollyMammoth.tools.3.label: Head
